Title: TwitterRt - Tweet from Windows Metro Apps
Description: Add the ability to tweet from your WinRT application.
HomeWiki:
TwitterRt - Post Tweets from WinRT / Metro Style applications.

Binaries available at: http://nuget.org/packages/TwitterRt

How to use it: http://w8isms.blogspot.com/2012/05/posting-to-twitter-from-metro-in-c.html

How it works: http://w8isms.blogspot.com/2012/07/twitterrt-design.html
